statements: DELETE FROM game_configurations WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard' AND game_mode = 'Survival';
DELETE FROM game_configurations WHERE id = 5 AND difficulty_level = 'Hard';
DELETE FROM game_configurations WHERE control_options = 'Keyboard' AND game_mode = 'Multiplayer';
DELETE FROM control_options WHERE option_name = 'Enhanced Controls';
DELETE FROM difficulty_levels WHERE level_id = 3 AND difficulty_value > 5;
DELETE FROM game_modes WHERE mode_name = 'Survival' AND description = 'Test your survival skills';
